New Records: Nishan Velupillay became the first Aussie of Sri Lankan descent to represent the Socceroos
Key Match Events: Nishan Velupillay scored on his international debut
Australia came from behind to win the match
Pre-Game Insights: The Socceroos had to win the match to improve their chances of qualifying for the World Cup
Australia's coach Tony Popovic made several changes to the team, including selecting Melbourne Victory's Nishan Velupillay for his international debut
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Gauci said that the win felt like a new beginning for the team
Craig Goodwin said that the team showed big character to respond to China's goal
Tony Popovic was vindicated by the win, which was his first match in charge of the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at a packed Adelaide Oval
The Socceroos will now travel to Japan for a crucial World Cup qualifier
Others: Australia's next match is against Japan on Tuesday night
The Socceroos will need to win the match to further improve their chances of qualifying for the World Cup
